description: Create a material unit of measure quantity.
permissions: Allowed when MaterialTransactionPolicy.create? passes for the referenced material transaction: admin users; members of the material transaction broker; members of the material supplier; or users who can update the related trip.
side_effects: Touches the related tender_job_schedule_shift after commit. May enqueue inventory change scheduling for related material sites when quantity is created and auto-create inventory changes is enabled.
validation_notes: --material-transaction, --unit-of-measure, and --quantity are required; quantity must be between 0 and 200000 (server validates numeric >= 0 and < 200000 unless skip_quantity_validation); the material transaction must be editable.
